As discussed , final policy wordings to be agreed on upon firm order while We can confidently highlight the following:

 

Arch’s Lead terms and PV policy will mirror what you currently have in hand at USD 60,000 per year from an S&P and A.M. best A+ rated company  , subject to firm order from your end .

Subject: Request for Quotations: Fidelity Insurance & Political Violence Policy - Chalhoub 

 

Dear Kev,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I’m reaching out to request quotations for two policies: Fidelity Insurance and Political Violence (PV) Insurance. Please find the relevant details below:

 

Fidelity Insurance

 

*	Attachments: I’ve attached the completed proposal form, along with the employee headcount and the related entities to be covered.
*	Incident History: In 2019, we had a major claim in KSA involving SAR 930,000 in stolen stock by warehouse employees. Since then, we’ve implemented stricter security measures. Additionally, we’ve had a few smaller incidents of cash theft by store employees, with relatively minor amounts ranging from AED 20,000 to AED 50,000.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Political Violence (PV) Insurance

 

*	Full Sum Insured: Details of the full sum insured are attached.
*	Loss History: The PV loss history is clean, with no incidents to report.
*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time.

*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time. I’d like to discuss and agree on the most effective approach for this.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Next Steps

 

*	Quotation Timeline: Let’s aim to finalize both quotations by September 9. This will give us sufficient time to complete the necessary KYCs and issue the policies.
*	Meeting Availability: If you need access to a specific market or wish to discuss the method for covering new locations, we can schedule a meeting next week. Although I’m currently on leave, I remain available for work-related matters.

 

Confidentiality

 

Please note that all provided information remains confidential and is to be used solely for obtaining quotations from relevant entities.

 

Future Opportunities

 

If your quotations are competitive and you can offer a compelling package, I’m prepared to consider placing the Christofle portfolio with you as well assuming that you will deliver a more competitive package both in terms of cost and quality of service.

 

Appreciate your attention to this matter and look forward to your response.

I’m reaching out to request quotations for two policies: Fidelity Insurance and Political Violence (PV) Insurance. Please find the relevant details below:

 

Fidelity Insurance

*	Attachments: I’ve attached the completed proposal form, along with the employee headcount and the related entities to be covered.
*	Incident History: In 2019, we had a major claim in KSA involving SAR 930,000 in stolen stock by warehouse employees. Since then, we’ve implemented stricter security measures. Additionally, we’ve had a few smaller incidents of cash theft by store employees, with relatively minor amounts ranging from AED 20,000 to AED 50,000.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Political Violence (PV) Insurance

 

*	Full Sum Insured: Details of the full sum insured are attached.
*	Loss History: The PV loss history is clean, with no incidents to report.
*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time. I’d like to discuss and agree on the most effective approach for this.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Next Steps

 

*	Quotation Timeline: Let’s aim to finalize both quotations by September 9. This will give us sufficient time to complete the necessary KYCs and issue the policies.
*	Meeting Availability: If you need access to a specific market or wish to discuss the method for covering new locations, we can schedule a meeting next week. Although I’m currently on leave, I remain available for work-related matters.

 

Confidentiality

 

Please note that all provided information remains confidential and is to be used solely for obtaining quotations from relevant entities.

We are happy to provide you with the official binding terms for the Regional Political Violence or Political Risk insurance program of M/S Chalhoub Group , via Marsh Emirates Insurance Brokers .

 

We attach binding terms and conditions and signed slip by leader with 100% placement guaranteed and full comprehensive policy wording for your review and approval , along with Marsh’s insurance strategy paper and cover , terms and conditions summary .

 

Please note that there should be a 5% fronting Fee allowance to be made in excess of USD 60,000 premium  equaling to USD 3,000 Per Annum .

 

We are always at your disposal and look forward to hearing from you soon on order to bind cover and proceed.

Kev Keshishian- ACII -ANZIIF

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >
Sent: Thursday, August 29, 2024 7:32 PM
To: Kechichian, Kevork <Kevork.Kechichian@marsh.com <mailto:Kevork.Kechichian@marsh.com> >
Subject: Request for Quotations: Fidelity Insurance & Political Violence Policy - Chalhoub

 

Dear Kev,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I’m reaching out to request quotations for two policies: Fidelity Insurance and Political Violence (PV) Insurance. Please find the relevant details below:

 

Fidelity Insurance

 

*	Attachments: I’ve attached the completed proposal form, along with the employee headcount and the related entities to be covered.
*	Incident History: In 2019, we had a major claim in KSA involving SAR 930,000 in stolen stock by warehouse employees.

chunks.text:
*	Incident History: In 2019, we had a major claim in KSA involving SAR 930,000 in stolen stock by warehouse employees. Since then, we’ve implemented stricter security measures. Additionally, we’ve had a few smaller incidents of cash theft by store employees, with relatively minor amounts ranging from AED 20,000 to AED 50,000.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Political Violence (PV) Insurance

 

*	Full Sum Insured: Details of the full sum insured are attached.
*	Loss History: The PV loss history is clean, with no incidents to report.
*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time. I’d like to discuss and agree on the most effective approach for this.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Next Steps

 

*	Quotation Timeline: Let’s aim to finalize both quotations by September 9. This will give us sufficient time to complete the necessary KYCs and issue the policies.
*	Meeting Availability: If you need access to a specific market or wish to discuss the method for covering new locations, we can schedule a meeting next week. Although I’m currently on leave, I remain available for work-related matters.

 

Confidentiality

 

Please note that all provided information remains confidential and is to be used solely for obtaining quotations from relevant entities.

 

Future Opportunities

 

If your quotations are competitive and you can offer a compelling package, I’m prepared to consider placing the Christofle portfolio with you as well assuming that you will deliver a more competitive package both in terms of cost and quality of service.

Dear Kev,

 

As requested, please find attached the relevant wording from the Commercial Crime and the Political Violence insurance policies.

 

Also for more details regarding the risk improvement initiated after the incident, below are the introduced improvements:

 

*	Enhanced surveillance: Added more cameras across the warehouse.
*	Tighter access control: Implemented stricter access controls and mandatory searches upon entry and exit.
*	Zero tolerance policy: Continued enforcement of our zero tolerance policy for theft.
*	Ethics training: Instituted yearly mandatory ethics training for all employees.
*	Whistleblower program: Established an anonymous whistleblower program for reporting any wrongdoing.
*	Improved inventory management: Introduced semi-annual mandatory internal stock-counts, with additional counts triggered by any concerns.

 

Remain at your disposal for any further details required.


Best Regards,

Hagop

Subject: Request for Quotations: Fidelity Insurance & Political Violence Policy - Chalhoub

 

Dear Kev,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I’m reaching out to request quotations for two policies: Fidelity Insurance and Political Violence (PV) Insurance. Please find the relevant details below:

 

Fidelity Insurance

 

*	Attachments: I’ve attached the completed proposal form, along with the employee headcount and the related entities to be covered.
*	Incident History: In 2019, we had a major claim in KSA involving SAR 930,000 in stolen stock by warehouse employees. Since then, we’ve implemented stricter security measures. Additionally, we’ve had a few smaller incidents of cash theft by store employees, with relatively minor amounts ranging from AED 20,000 to AED 50,000.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Political Violence (PV) Insurance

chunks.text:
Political Violence (PV) Insurance

 

*	Full Sum Insured: Details of the full sum insured are attached.
*	Loss History: The PV loss history is clean, with no incidents to report.
*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time. I’d like to discuss and agree on the most effective approach for this.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Next Steps

 

*	Quotation Timeline: Let’s aim to finalize both quotations by September 9. This will give us sufficient time to complete the necessary KYCs and issue the policies.
*	Meeting Availability: If you need access to a specific market or wish to discuss the method for covering new locations, we can schedule a meeting next week. Although I’m currently on leave, I remain available for work-related matters.

 

Confidentiality

 

Please note that all provided information remains confidential and is to be used solely for obtaining quotations from relevant entities.

 

Future Opportunities

 

If your quotations are competitive and you can offer a compelling package, I’m prepared to consider placing the Christofle portfolio with you as well assuming that you will deliver a more competitive package both in terms of cost and quality of service.

 

Appreciate your attention to this matter and look forward to your response.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

I hope this email finds you well

 

As part of customer due diligence (also known as “KYC”) which is a regulatory requirement, the insurer(EMIRATES INSURANCE) has requested for the following documents.

 

We kindly request to please furnish us with the information described below.

 

*	Certificate of Incorporation/or MOA
*	Trade License & VAT Certificate
*	The Emirates ID of the Owner/Authorized Person – and POA if applicable,
*	EID of shareholders who owns more than 25% 
*	Proof of Banking details- this can be a bank statement, letter from the bank, cancelled blank cheque or online screenshot of net banking which must have details like Bank Name, Account name, account number etc..
*	COF form to be filled-out( please return in word format not signed )

 

We are available to discuss any questions at any time in order to facilitate the process 

 

We look forward to receiving you’re the documents.

 

Best Regards,

Hannah Gabo

Account Specialist – Operations

Mobile +971 50-519-8409

Subject: Request for Quotations: Fidelity Insurance & Political Violence Policy - Chalhoub

 

Dear Kev,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I’m reaching out to request quotations for two policies: Fidelity Insurance and Political Violence (PV) Insurance. Please find the relevant details below:

 

Fidelity Insurance

 

*	Attachments: I’ve attached the completed proposal form, along with the employee headcount and the related entities to be covered.
*	Incident History: In 2019, we had a major claim in KSA involving SAR 930,000 in stolen stock by warehouse employees. Since then, we’ve implemented stricter security measures. Additionally, we’ve had a few smaller incidents of cash theft by store employees, with relatively minor amounts ranging from AED 20,000 to AED 50,000.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Political Violence (PV) Insurance

 

*	Full Sum Insured: Details of the full sum insured are attached.
*	Loss History: The PV loss history is clean, with no incidents to report.
*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time.

*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time. I’d like to discuss and agree on the most effective approach for this.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Next Steps

 

*	Quotation Timeline: Let’s aim to finalize both quotations by September 9. This will give us sufficient time to complete the necessary KYCs and issue the policies.
*	Meeting Availability: If you need access to a specific market or wish to discuss the method for covering new locations, we can schedule a meeting next week. Although I’m currently on leave, I remain available for work-related matters.

 

Confidentiality

 

Please note that all provided information remains confidential and is to be used solely for obtaining quotations from relevant entities.

 

Future Opportunities

 

If your quotations are competitive and you can offer a compelling package, I’m prepared to consider placing the Christofle portfolio with you as well assuming that you will deliver a more competitive package both in terms of cost and quality of service.

 

Appreciate your attention to this matter and look forward to your response.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

Dear Kevork,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

As discussed, please ensure the final proposal for the Political Violence policy is submitted by the end of the day on Wednesday, September 25, 2024. It is imperative that the proposal includes comprehensive terms and conditions for a thorough review. We plan to finalize the award by Friday, September 27, 2024.

 

For the Commercial Crime proposal, the submission deadline is Wednesday, October 9, 2024, with the award decision by Friday, October 11, 2024. Should you require any further information, please request it well before the submission date.

 

As evident from the timelines, please submit your best and final terms, as there will be no second round of negotiation.

 

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

 

Best regards,

Hagop

Subject: Request for Quotations: Fidelity Insurance & Political Violence Policy - Chalhoub

 

Dear Kev,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I’m reaching out to request quotations for two policies: Fidelity Insurance and Political Violence (PV) Insurance. Please find the relevant details below:

 

Fidelity Insurance

 

*	Attachments: I’ve attached the completed proposal form, along with the employee headcount and the related entities to be covered.
*	Incident History: In 2019, we had a major claim in KSA involving SAR 930,000 in stolen stock by warehouse employees. Since then, we’ve implemented stricter security measures. Additionally, we’ve had a few smaller incidents of cash theft by store employees, with relatively minor amounts ranging from AED 20,000 to AED 50,000.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Political Violence (PV) Insurance

 

*	Full Sum Insured: Details of the full sum insured are attached.
*	Loss History: The PV loss history is clean, with no incidents to report.
*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time.

*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time. I’d like to discuss and agree on the most effective approach for this.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Next Steps

 

*	Quotation Timeline: Let’s aim to finalize both quotations by September 9. This will give us sufficient time to complete the necessary KYCs and issue the policies.
*	Meeting Availability: If you need access to a specific market or wish to discuss the method for covering new locations, we can schedule a meeting next week. Although I’m currently on leave, I remain available for work-related matters.

 

Confidentiality

 

Please note that all provided information remains confidential and is to be used solely for obtaining quotations from relevant entities.

 

Future Opportunities

 

If your quotations are competitive and you can offer a compelling package, I’m prepared to consider placing the Christofle portfolio with you as well assuming that you will deliver a more competitive package both in terms of cost and quality of service.

 

Appreciate your attention to this matter and look forward to your response.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

Dear Kev,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I’m reaching out to request quotations for two policies: Fidelity Insurance and Political Violence (PV) Insurance. Please find the relevant details below:

 

Fidelity Insurance

 

*	Attachments: I’ve attached the completed proposal form, along with the employee headcount and the related entities to be covered.
*	Incident History: In 2019, we had a major claim in KSA involving SAR 930,000 in stolen stock by warehouse employees. Since then, we’ve implemented stricter security measures. Additionally, we’ve had a few smaller incidents of cash theft by store employees, with relatively minor amounts ranging from AED 20,000 to AED 50,000.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Political Violence (PV) Insurance

 

*	Full Sum Insured: Details of the full sum insured are attached.
*	Loss History: The PV loss history is clean, with no incidents to report.
*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time.

*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time. I’d like to discuss and agree on the most effective approach for this.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Next Steps

 

*	Quotation Timeline: Let’s aim to finalize both quotations by September 9. This will give us sufficient time to complete the necessary KYCs and issue the policies.
*	Meeting Availability: If you need access to a specific market or wish to discuss the method for covering new locations, we can schedule a meeting next week. Although I’m currently on leave, I remain available for work-related matters.

 

Confidentiality

 

Please note that all provided information remains confidential and is to be used solely for obtaining quotations from relevant entities.

 

Future Opportunities

 

If your quotations are competitive and you can offer a compelling package, I’m prepared to consider placing the Christofle portfolio with you as well assuming that you will deliver a more competitive package both in terms of cost and quality of service.

 

Appreciate your attention to this matter and look forward to your response.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

We are glad to inform you that We have  been able to source 3 terms from the market on Chalhoub Group’s  Commercial Crime Policy for the year 2024-2025 .

 

Please find our comments and findings here below for your review in addition to the attached (which includes Marsh’s manuscript Crime and SEF Delta wording which shall be adopted by Reinsurers ).

 

 

MENA RE: 

 

Premium =  AED 170,000/- with 50% support and this premium is excluding VAT. 

Deductible is AED 50,000 as expiry. 

 

Please note that these terms are strictly subject to below: we will need the Firm order  at least a week prior to expiry and need the below information to confirm cover. 

 

*	Signed and dated NCD NMCD
*	Full audited financials (this is essential information and will have to be obtained prior binding)

 

MENA RE quote and wording to be used are attached. (Addition of SEF Cover  excluding any additional premium )

 

RELM Insurance:

 

LOL: AED 1,850,000 AOC and AED 3,700,000 in the aggregate. 

Premium: AED 275,000/-

Deductible: AED 185,000/- except KSA which would be AED 300,000/-

 

Wording to be used is Marsh Delta Crime Wording which is attached. 

 

Swiss RE:

 

On a non-binding indication basis, we would be targeting:

Deductible increased from AED 50,000 to AED 180,000 eel (USD 50k)

@ corresponding 100% gross premium of USD 45,000 (gross of 25%)

Or 

Deductible increased from AED 50,000 to AED 90,000 eel (USD 25k) (=minimum acceptable deductible)

@ corresponding 100% gross premium of USD 65,000 (gross of 25%)

 

Period 12 months

Scope of cover: SR Commercial Crime policy wording

Scope of cover: SR Commercial Crime policy wording

SR share around 50% (tba)

Subject to Cedent retention 10%

Subject to review and agreement to the final terms and final RI slip

 

We would also like to highlight that The main extension in our wording is the SEF (Social Engineering and Fraud extension), the definition of loss includes Social Engineering Fraud and have very limited exclusion when compared to  current wording. The most amount of crime loss or claims we are seeing in recent times are due to SEF and is on a rise. To have this extension is absolutely essential and the fact that we are able to get Chalhoub Group the same expiring price and deductibles while adding SEF cover which is usually rejected by reinsurers or is subject to  20-30 % Loading ) 

 

We are happy to join you on a call or have a face to face meeting to go through the quote , additional benefits and next steps whenever you’re free.

 

Best regards,

Kev

Remain at your disposal for any further details required.


Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

Dear Kev,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

We have 3 weeks for the PV, I can extend it if you need more time.

 

Let me know if you have interest in quoting and have a specific market in mind that you need access to so that I can give you the BOR for it.

 

Let me know if you need any further details in order to take things forward.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

Subject: Request for Quotations: Fidelity Insurance & Political Violence Policy - Chalhoub 

 

Dear Kev,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I’m reaching out to request quotations for two policies: Fidelity Insurance and Political Violence (PV) Insurance. Please find the relevant details below:

 

Fidelity Insurance

 

*	Attachments: I’ve attached the completed proposal form, along with the employee headcount and the related entities to be covered.
*	Incident History: In 2019, we had a major claim in KSA involving SAR 930,000 in stolen stock by warehouse employees. Since then, we’ve implemented stricter security measures. Additionally, we’ve had a few smaller incidents of cash theft by store employees, with relatively minor amounts ranging from AED 20,000 to AED 50,000.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Political Violence (PV) Insurance

 

*	Full Sum Insured: Details of the full sum insured are attached.
*	Loss History: The PV loss history is clean, with no incidents to report.
*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time.

*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time. I’d like to discuss and agree on the most effective approach for this.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Next Steps

 

*	Quotation Timeline: Let’s aim to finalize both quotations by September 9. This will give us sufficient time to complete the necessary KYCs and issue the policies.
*	Meeting Availability: If you need access to a specific market or wish to discuss the method for covering new locations, we can schedule a meeting next week. Although I’m currently on leave, I remain available for work-related matters.

 

Confidentiality

 

Please note that all provided information remains confidential and is to be used solely for obtaining quotations from relevant entities.

 

Future Opportunities

 

If your quotations are competitive and you can offer a compelling package, I’m prepared to consider placing the Christofle portfolio with you as well assuming that you will deliver a more competitive package both in terms of cost and quality of service.

 

Appreciate your attention to this matter and look forward to your response.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

Dear Hagop,

 

The Political Violence policy has been fronted by Fidelity United Insurance, complying with the local regulations in UAE- We have attached the certificate of insurance for your reference and policy document will follow shortly.

 

We will require you to complete the KYC requirements by providing the below information:

 

*	Valid Trade License
*	Legal document showing the authorized signatory of the Company ( such as, POA)
*	Legal document showing the name of the shareholders 
*	VAT Certificate 
*	EID or Passport with Visa copy for the authorized signatory and the beneficiary owners

 

Could you also confirm no known or reported losses, incidents & threats and no material change this policy till date? Apologies , but we will need another confirmation from you that is current dated, your last confirmation was dated 1st October.

 

Thanks & Regards

 

Puja Kapoor

Subject: Request for Quotations: Fidelity Insurance & Political Violence Policy - Chalhoub

 

Dear Kev,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I’m reaching out to request quotations for two policies: Fidelity Insurance and Political Violence (PV) Insurance. Please find the relevant details below:

 

Fidelity Insurance

 

*	Attachments: I’ve attached the completed proposal form, along with the employee headcount and the related entities to be covered.
*	Incident History: In 2019, we had a major claim in KSA involving SAR 930,000 in stolen stock by warehouse employees. Since then, we’ve implemented stricter security measures. Additionally, we’ve had a few smaller incidents of cash theft by store employees, with relatively minor amounts ranging from AED 20,000 to AED 50,000.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Political Violence (PV) Insurance

 

*	Full Sum Insured: Details of the full sum insured are attached.
*	Loss History: The PV loss history is clean, with no incidents to report.
*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time.

*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time. I’d like to discuss and agree on the most effective approach for this.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Next Steps

 

*	Quotation Timeline: Let’s aim to finalize both quotations by September 9. This will give us sufficient time to complete the necessary KYCs and issue the policies.
*	Meeting Availability: If you need access to a specific market or wish to discuss the method for covering new locations, we can schedule a meeting next week. Although I’m currently on leave, I remain available for work-related matters.

 

Confidentiality

 

Please note that all provided information remains confidential and is to be used solely for obtaining quotations from relevant entities.

 

Future Opportunities

 

If your quotations are competitive and you can offer a compelling package, I’m prepared to consider placing the Christofle portfolio with you as well assuming that you will deliver a more competitive package both in terms of cost and quality of service.

 

Appreciate your attention to this matter and look forward to your response.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

Dear Hagop,

 

The Political Violence policy has been fronted by Fidelity United Insurance, complying with the local regulations in UAE- We have attached the certificate of insurance for your reference and policy document will follow shortly.

 

We will require you to complete the KYC requirements by providing the below information:

 

*	Valid Trade License
*	Legal document showing the authorized signatory of the Company ( such as, POA)
*	Legal document showing the name of the shareholders 
*	VAT Certificate 
*	EID or Passport with Visa copy for the authorized signatory and the beneficiary owners

 

Could you also confirm no known or reported losses, incidents & threats and no material change this policy till date? Apologies , but we will need another confirmation from you that is current dated, your last confirmation was dated 1st October.

 

Thanks & Regards

 

Puja Kapoor

Vice President

In reference to your request to quote , We are happy to attach the non-binding indications which We have received from the markets for Chalhoub group’s PV(PRI) and Commercial Crime policies .

 

As discussed , final policy wordings to be agreed on upon firm order while We can confidently highlight the following:

 

Arch’s Lead terms and PV policy will mirror what you currently have in hand at USD 60,000 per year from an S&P and A.M. best A+ rated company  , subject to firm order from your end .

 

In addition , We would be able to obtain you additional quotes on the Commercial Crime policy if you are capable of providing us the groups , audited 2023 financial statement and 2024 interim statement or forecast and are happy to sign in on NDA .

Our aim, naturally would also to try to obtain around 15%  discount on the commercial crime policy for both options depending on your preference .

 

We are happy to jump wit you on a call to discuss and clarify any questions or concerns you may have.

 

Best regards,

 

 

Kev Keshishian- ACII - ANZIIF

Subject: Request for Quotations: Fidelity Insurance & Political Violence Policy - Chalhoub

 

Dear Kev,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I’m reaching out to request quotations for two policies: Fidelity Insurance and Political Violence (PV) Insurance. Please find the relevant details below:

 

Fidelity Insurance

 

*	Attachments: I’ve attached the completed proposal form, along with the employee headcount and the related entities to be covered.
*	Incident History: In 2019, we had a major claim in KSA involving SAR 930,000 in stolen stock by warehouse employees. Since then, we’ve implemented stricter security measures. Additionally, we’ve had a few smaller incidents of cash theft by store employees, with relatively minor amounts ranging from AED 20,000 to AED 50,000.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Political Violence (PV) Insurance

 

*	Full Sum Insured: Details of the full sum insured are attached.
*	Loss History: The PV loss history is clean, with no incidents to report.
*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time.

*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time. I’d like to discuss and agree on the most effective approach for this.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Next Steps

 

*	Quotation Timeline: Let’s aim to finalize both quotations by September 9. This will give us sufficient time to complete the necessary KYCs and issue the policies.
*	Meeting Availability: If you need access to a specific market or wish to discuss the method for covering new locations, we can schedule a meeting next week. Although I’m currently on leave, I remain available for work-related matters.

 

Confidentiality

 

Please note that all provided information remains confidential and is to be used solely for obtaining quotations from relevant entities.

 

Future Opportunities

 

If your quotations are competitive and you can offer a compelling package, I’m prepared to consider placing the Christofle portfolio with you as well assuming that you will deliver a more competitive package both in terms of cost and quality of service.

 

Appreciate your attention to this matter and look forward to your response.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

*	Improved inventory management: Introduced semi-annual mandatory internal stock-counts, with additional counts triggered by any concerns.

 

Remain at your disposal for any further details required.


Best Regards,

Hagop

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >
Sent: Thursday, August 29, 2024 7:32 PM
To: Kechichian, Kevork <Kevork.Kechichian@marsh.com <mailto:Kevork.Kechichian@marsh.com> >
Subject: Request for Quotations: Fidelity Insurance & Political Violence Policy - Chalhoub

 

Dear Kev,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I’m reaching out to request quotations for two policies: Fidelity Insurance and Political Violence (PV) Insurance. Please find the relevant details below:

 

Fidelity Insurance

 

*	Attachments: I’ve attached the completed proposal form, along with the employee headcount and the related entities to be covered.
*	Incident History: In 2019, we had a major claim in KSA involving SAR 930,000 in stolen stock by warehouse employees. Since then, we’ve implemented stricter security measures. Additionally, we’ve had a few smaller incidents of cash theft by store employees, with relatively minor amounts ranging from AED 20,000 to AED 50,000.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Political Violence (PV) Insurance

 

*	Full Sum Insured: Details of the full sum insured are attached.
*	Loss History: The PV loss history is clean, with no incidents to report.
*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time.

*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time. I’d like to discuss and agree on the most effective approach for this.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Next Steps

 

*	Quotation Timeline: Let’s aim to finalize both quotations by September 9. This will give us sufficient time to complete the necessary KYCs and issue the policies.
*	Meeting Availability: If you need access to a specific market or wish to discuss the method for covering new locations, we can schedule a meeting next week. Although I’m currently on leave, I remain available for work-related matters.

 

Confidentiality

 

Please note that all provided information remains confidential and is to be used solely for obtaining quotations from relevant entities.

 

Future Opportunities

 

If your quotations are competitive and you can offer a compelling package, I’m prepared to consider placing the Christofle portfolio with you as well assuming that you will deliver a more competitive package both in terms of cost and quality of service.

 

Appreciate your attention to this matter and look forward to your response.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

Arch’s Lead terms and PV policy will mirror what you currently have in hand at USD 60,000 per year from an S&P and A.M. best A+ rated company  , subject to firm order from your end .

Subject: Request for Quotations: Fidelity Insurance & Political Violence Policy - Chalhoub

 

Dear Kev,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I’m reaching out to request quotations for two policies: Fidelity Insurance and Political Violence (PV) Insurance. Please find the relevant details below:

 

Fidelity Insurance

 

*	Attachments: I’ve attached the completed proposal form, along with the employee headcount and the related entities to be covered.
*	Incident History: In 2019, we had a major claim in KSA involving SAR 930,000 in stolen stock by warehouse employees. Since then, we’ve implemented stricter security measures. Additionally, we’ve had a few smaller incidents of cash theft by store employees, with relatively minor amounts ranging from AED 20,000 to AED 50,000.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Political Violence (PV) Insurance

 

*	Full Sum Insured: Details of the full sum insured are attached.
*	Loss History: The PV loss history is clean, with no incidents to report.
*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time.

*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time. I’d like to discuss and agree on the most effective approach for this.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Next Steps

 

*	Quotation Timeline: Let’s aim to finalize both quotations by September 9. This will give us sufficient time to complete the necessary KYCs and issue the policies.
*	Meeting Availability: If you need access to a specific market or wish to discuss the method for covering new locations, we can schedule a meeting next week. Although I’m currently on leave, I remain available for work-related matters.

 

Confidentiality

 

Please note that all provided information remains confidential and is to be used solely for obtaining quotations from relevant entities.

 

Future Opportunities

 

If your quotations are competitive and you can offer a compelling package, I’m prepared to consider placing the Christofle portfolio with you as well assuming that you will deliver a more competitive package both in terms of cost and quality of service.

 

Appreciate your attention to this matter and look forward to your response.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

Dear Kevork,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

As discussed, please ensure the final proposal for the Political Violence policy is submitted by the end of the day on Wednesday, September 25, 2024. It is imperative that the proposal includes comprehensive terms and conditions for a thorough review. We plan to finalize the award by Friday, September 27, 2024.

 

For the Commercial Crime proposal, the submission deadline is Wednesday, October 9, 2024, with the award decision by Friday, October 11, 2024. Should you require any further information, please request it well before the submission date.

 

As evident from the timelines, please submit your best and final terms, as there will be no second round of negotiation.

 

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

 

Best regards,

Hagop

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >
Sent: Thursday, August 29, 2024 7:32 PM
To: Kechichian, Kevork <Kevork.Kechichian@marsh.com <mailto:Kevork.Kechichian@marsh.com> >
Subject: Request for Quotations: Fidelity Insurance & Political Violence Policy - Chalhoub

 

Dear Kev,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I’m reaching out to request quotations for two policies: Fidelity Insurance and Political Violence (PV) Insurance. Please find the relevant details below:

 

Fidelity Insurance

 

*	Attachments: I’ve attached the completed proposal form, along with the employee headcount and the related entities to be covered.
*	Incident History: In 2019, we had a major claim in KSA involving SAR 930,000 in stolen stock by warehouse employees. Since then, we’ve implemented stricter security measures. Additionally, we’ve had a few smaller incidents of cash theft by store employees, with relatively minor amounts ranging from AED 20,000 to AED 50,000.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Political Violence (PV) Insurance

 

*	Full Sum Insured: Details of the full sum insured are attached.
*	Loss History: The PV loss history is clean, with no incidents to report.
*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time.

*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time. I’d like to discuss and agree on the most effective approach for this.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Next Steps

 

*	Quotation Timeline: Let’s aim to finalize both quotations by September 9. This will give us sufficient time to complete the necessary KYCs and issue the policies.
*	Meeting Availability: If you need access to a specific market or wish to discuss the method for covering new locations, we can schedule a meeting next week. Although I’m currently on leave, I remain available for work-related matters.

 

Confidentiality

 

Please note that all provided information remains confidential and is to be used solely for obtaining quotations from relevant entities.

 

Future Opportunities

 

If your quotations are competitive and you can offer a compelling package, I’m prepared to consider placing the Christofle portfolio with you as well assuming that you will deliver a more competitive package both in terms of cost and quality of service.

 

Appreciate your attention to this matter and look forward to your response.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

We’re pleased to confirm the attached proposal. Please proceed with binding the cover.

 

However, we kindly request a small amendment to the policy conditions as follows:

*	10% - Addition / Deletion at NIL AP - With 30 60 days declaration

Since this is a group policy, we anticipate multiple changes throughout the year with store openings and closures. Let us please amend the automatic inclusion of new locations subject to declaration within 60 days to be on the safe side.

I hope this message finds you well.

We have 3 weeks for the PV, I can extend it if you need more time.

Hagop

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >
Sent: Thursday, August 29, 2024 7:32 PM
To: Kechichian, Kevork <Kevork.Kechichian@marsh.com <mailto:Kevork.Kechichian@marsh.com> >
Subject: Request for Quotations: Fidelity Insurance & Political Violence Policy - Chalhoub

 

Dear Kev,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I’m reaching out to request quotations for two policies: Fidelity Insurance and Political Violence (PV) Insurance. Please find the relevant details below:

 

Fidelity Insurance

 

*	Attachments: I’ve attached the completed proposal form, along with the employee headcount and the related entities to be covered.
*	Incident History: In 2019, we had a major claim in KSA involving SAR 930,000 in stolen stock by warehouse employees. Since then, we’ve implemented stricter security measures. Additionally, we’ve had a few smaller incidents of cash theft by store employees, with relatively minor amounts ranging from AED 20,000 to AED 50,000.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Political Violence (PV) Insurance

 

*	Full Sum Insured: Details of the full sum insured are attached.
*	Loss History: The PV loss history is clean, with no incidents to report.
*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time.

chunks.text:
*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time. I’d like to discuss and agree on the most effective approach for this.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Next Steps

 

*	Quotation Timeline: Let’s aim to finalize both quotations by September 9. This will give us sufficient time to complete the necessary KYCs and issue the policies.
*	Meeting Availability: If you need access to a specific market or wish to discuss the method for covering new locations, we can schedule a meeting next week. Although I’m currently on leave, I remain available for work-related matters.

 

Confidentiality

 

Please note that all provided information remains confidential and is to be used solely for obtaining quotations from relevant entities.

 

Future Opportunities

 

If your quotations are competitive and you can offer a compelling package, I’m prepared to consider placing the Christofle portfolio with you as well assuming that you will deliver a more competitive package both in terms of cost and quality of service.

 

Appreciate your attention to this matter and look forward to your response.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

Dear Hagop,

 

The Political Violence policy has been fronted by Fidelity United Insurance, complying with the local regulations in UAE- We have attached the certificate of insurance for your reference and policy document will follow shortly.

 

We will require you to complete the KYC requirements by providing the below information:

 

*	Valid Trade License
*	Legal document showing the authorized signatory of the Company ( such as, POA)
*	Legal document showing the name of the shareholders 
*	VAT Certificate 
*	EID or Passport with Visa copy for the authorized signatory and the beneficiary owners

 

Could you also confirm no known or reported losses, incidents & threats and no material change this policy till date? Apologies , but we will need another confirmation from you that is current dated, your last confirmation was dated 1st October.

 

Thanks & Regards

 

Puja Kapoor

Vice President

In reference to your request to quote , We are happy to attach the non-binding indications which We have received from the markets for Chalhoub group’s PV(PRI) and Commercial Crime policies .

 

As discussed , final policy wordings to be agreed on upon firm order while We can confidently highlight the following:

 

Arch’s Lead terms and PV policy will mirror what you currently have in hand at USD 60,000 per year from an S&P and A.M. best A+ rated company  , subject to firm order from your end .

 

In addition , We would be able to obtain you additional quotes on the Commercial Crime policy if you are capable of providing us the groups , audited 2023 financial statement and 2024 interim statement or forecast and are happy to sign in on NDA .

Our aim, naturally would also to try to obtain around 15%  discount on the commercial crime policy for both options depending on your preference .

 

We are happy to jump wit you on a call to discuss and clarify any questions or concerns you may have.

 

Best regards,

 

 

Kev Keshishian- ACII - ANZIIF

Cert. ISO 31000 Enterprise Risk Management

Chartered Insurance Practitioner

As requested, please find attached the relevant wording from the Commercial Crime and the Political Violence insurance policies.

 

Also for more details regarding the risk improvement initiated after the incident, below are the introduced improvements:

 

*	Enhanced surveillance: Added more cameras across the warehouse.
*	Tighter access control: Implemented stricter access controls and mandatory searches upon entry and exit.
*	Zero tolerance policy: Continued enforcement of our zero tolerance policy for theft.
*	Ethics training: Instituted yearly mandatory ethics training for all employees.

Subject: Request for Quotations: Fidelity Insurance & Political Violence Policy - Chalhoub

 

Dear Kev,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I’m reaching out to request quotations for two policies: Fidelity Insurance and Political Violence (PV) Insurance. Please find the relevant details below:

 

Fidelity Insurance

 

*	Attachments: I’ve attached the completed proposal form, along with the employee headcount and the related entities to be covered.
*	Incident History: In 2019, we had a major claim in KSA involving SAR 930,000 in stolen stock by warehouse employees. Since then, we’ve implemented stricter security measures. Additionally, we’ve had a few smaller incidents of cash theft by store employees, with relatively minor amounts ranging from AED 20,000 to AED 50,000.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Political Violence (PV) Insurance

 

*	Full Sum Insured: Details of the full sum insured are attached.
*	Loss History: The PV loss history is clean, with no incidents to report.
*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time.

*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time. I’d like to discuss and agree on the most effective approach for this.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Next Steps

 

*	Quotation Timeline: Let’s aim to finalize both quotations by September 9. This will give us sufficient time to complete the necessary KYCs and issue the policies.
*	Meeting Availability: If you need access to a specific market or wish to discuss the method for covering new locations, we can schedule a meeting next week. Although I’m currently on leave, I remain available for work-related matters.

 

Confidentiality

 

Please note that all provided information remains confidential and is to be used solely for obtaining quotations from relevant entities.

 

Future Opportunities

 

If your quotations are competitive and you can offer a compelling package, I’m prepared to consider placing the Christofle portfolio with you as well assuming that you will deliver a more competitive package both in terms of cost and quality of service.

 

Appreciate your attention to this matter and look forward to your response.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

We are happy to provide you with the official binding terms for the Regional Political Violence or Political Risk insurance program of M/S Chalhoub Group , via Marsh Emirates Insurance Brokers .

Dear Hagop ,

 

I hope you’re well .

 

In reference to your request to quote , We are happy to attach the non-binding indications which We have received from the markets for Chalhoub group’s PV(PRI) and Commercial Crime policies .

 

As discussed , final policy wordings to be agreed on upon firm order while We can confidently highlight the following:

 

Arch’s Lead terms and PV policy will mirror what you currently have in hand at USD 60,000 per year from an S&P and A.M. best A+ rated company  , subject to firm order from your end .

 

In addition , We would be able to obtain you additional quotes on the Commercial Crime policy if you are capable of providing us the groups , audited 2023 financial statement and 2024 interim statement or forecast and are happy to sign in on NDA .

Our aim, naturally would also to try to obtain around 15%  discount on the commercial crime policy for both options depending on your preference .

 

We are happy to jump wit you on a call to discuss and clarify any questions or concerns you may have.

 

Best regards,

 

 

Kev Keshishian- ACII - ANZIIF

Also for more details regarding the risk improvement initiated after the incident, below are the introduced improvements:

 

*	Enhanced surveillance: Added more cameras across the warehouse.
*	Tighter access control: Implemented stricter access controls and mandatory searches upon entry and exit.
*	Zero tolerance policy: Continued enforcement of our zero tolerance policy for theft.
*	Ethics training: Instituted yearly mandatory ethics training for all employees.
*	Whistleblower program: Established an anonymous whistleblower program for reporting any wrongdoing.
*	Improved inventory management: Introduced semi-annual mandatory internal stock-counts, with additional counts triggered by any concerns.

 

Remain at your disposal for any further details required.


Best Regards,

Hagop

Subject: Request for Quotations: Fidelity Insurance & Political Violence Policy - Chalhoub

 

Dear Kev,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I’m reaching out to request quotations for two policies: Fidelity Insurance and Political Violence (PV) Insurance. Please find the relevant details below:

 

Fidelity Insurance

 

*	Attachments: I’ve attached the completed proposal form, along with the employee headcount and the related entities to be covered.
*	Incident History: In 2019, we had a major claim in KSA involving SAR 930,000 in stolen stock by warehouse employees. Since then, we’ve implemented stricter security measures. Additionally, we’ve had a few smaller incidents of cash theft by store employees, with relatively minor amounts ranging from AED 20,000 to AED 50,000.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Political Violence (PV) Insurance

 

*	Full Sum Insured: Details of the full sum insured are attached.
*	Loss History: The PV loss history is clean, with no incidents to report.
*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time.

*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time. I’d like to discuss and agree on the most effective approach for this.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Next Steps

 

*	Quotation Timeline: Let’s aim to finalize both quotations by September 9. This will give us sufficient time to complete the necessary KYCs and issue the policies.
*	Meeting Availability: If you need access to a specific market or wish to discuss the method for covering new locations, we can schedule a meeting next week. Although I’m currently on leave, I remain available for work-related matters.

 

Confidentiality

 

Please note that all provided information remains confidential and is to be used solely for obtaining quotations from relevant entities.

 

Future Opportunities

 

If your quotations are competitive and you can offer a compelling package, I’m prepared to consider placing the Christofle portfolio with you as well assuming that you will deliver a more competitive package both in terms of cost and quality of service.

 

Appreciate your attention to this matter and look forward to your response.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

Dear Kevork,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

As discussed, please ensure the final proposal for the Political Violence policy is submitted by the end of the day on Wednesday, September 25, 2024. It is imperative that the proposal includes comprehensive terms and conditions for a thorough review. We plan to finalize the award by Friday, September 27, 2024.

 

For the Commercial Crime proposal, the submission deadline is Wednesday, October 9, 2024, with the award decision by Friday, October 11, 2024. Should you require any further information, please request it well before the submission date.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Hagop

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >
Sent: Thursday, August 29, 2024 7:32 PM
To: Kechichian, Kevork <Kevork.Kechichian@marsh.com <mailto:Kevork.Kechichian@marsh.com> >
Subject: Request for Quotations: Fidelity Insurance & Political Violence Policy - Chalhoub

 

Dear Kev,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I’m reaching out to request quotations for two policies: Fidelity Insurance and Political Violence (PV) Insurance. Please find the relevant details below:

 

Fidelity Insurance

 

*	Attachments: I’ve attached the completed proposal form, along with the employee headcount and the related entities to be covered.
*	Incident History: In 2019, we had a major claim in KSA involving SAR 930,000 in stolen stock by warehouse employees. Since then, we’ve implemented stricter security measures. Additionally, we’ve had a few smaller incidents of cash theft by store employees, with relatively minor amounts ranging from AED 20,000 to AED 50,000.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Political Violence (PV) Insurance

 

*	Full Sum Insured: Details of the full sum insured are attached.
*	Loss History: The PV loss history is clean, with no incidents to report.
*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time.

*	Coverage for New Locations: We have over 500 locations, so it’s important to establish a method for covering new locations without requiring declarations each time. I’d like to discuss and agree on the most effective approach for this.
*	Existing Policies: I’ve also attached details of our current policies for your reference.

 

Next Steps

 

*	Quotation Timeline: Let’s aim to finalize both quotations by September 9. This will give us sufficient time to complete the necessary KYCs and issue the policies.
*	Meeting Availability: If you need access to a specific market or wish to discuss the method for covering new locations, we can schedule a meeting next week. Although I’m currently on leave, I remain available for work-related matters.

 

Confidentiality

 

Please note that all provided information remains confidential and is to be used solely for obtaining quotations from relevant entities.

 

Future Opportunities

 

If your quotations are competitive and you can offer a compelling package, I’m prepared to consider placing the Christofle portfolio with you as well assuming that you will deliver a more competitive package both in terms of cost and quality of service.

 

Appreciate your attention to this matter and look forward to your response.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

Dear Hagop,

 

The Political Violence policy has been fronted by Fidelity United Insurance, complying with the local regulations in UAE- We have attached the certificate of insurance for your reference and policy document will follow shortly.

 

We will require you to complete the KYC requirements by providing the below information:

 

*	Valid Trade License
*	Legal document showing the authorized signatory of the Company ( such as, POA)
*	Legal document showing the name of the shareholders 
*	VAT Certificate 
*	EID or Passport with Visa copy for the authorized signatory and the beneficiary owners

 

Could you also confirm no known or reported losses, incidents & threats and no material change this policy till date? Apologies , but we will need another confirmation from you that is current dated, your last confirmation was dated 1st October.

 

Thanks & Regards

 

Puja Kapoor

Dear Kevork,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

As discussed, please ensure the final proposal for the Political Violence policy is submitted by the end of the day on Wednesday, September 25, 2024. It is imperative that the proposal includes comprehensive terms and conditions for a thorough review. We plan to finalize the award by Friday, September 27, 2024.

As evident from the timelines, please submit your best and final terms, as there will be no second round of negotiation.
